basics.name: Shashank
basics.headline: B.Tech Biotechnology & Bioinformatics Student | AI, ML, DS & Software Engineering Enthusiast
basics.summary: Highly motivated AI and Bioinformatics undergraduate at IIT Hyderabad with a passion for Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Genome Analysis, Software Engineering, and Full-Stack Development. Experienced in building scalable ML pipelines, deploying production-ready applications, and performing genomic data analysis. Strong background in DSA, problem solving, and research-driven development.

achievements: Developed an end-to-end ML pipeline for genomic feature extraction using Python, PyTorch, and Biopython.
Improved classifier accuracy by 12% using optimized CNN architectures and hyperparameter tuning.
Automated preprocessing of protein sequences, reducing manual work by 60%.
Collaborated with PhD researchers to interpret biological relevance of model predictions.
Implemented visualization dashboards for monitoring training metrics and dataset statistics.
Assisted in research exploring evolutionary patterns in protein families using HMM-based sequence models.
Implemented a custom alignment scoring system improving local alignment performance.
Optimized large-scale dataset handling using multiprocessing and memory-efficient loaders.
Created publication-ready plots using Matplotlib and Seaborn.
Built full-stack features for an internal analytics dashboard using React and FastAPI.
Designed REST APIs with token-based authentication.
Refactored legacy code improving performance by 40%.
Wrote unit tests achieving 85% code coverage.

projects.name: Protein Sequence Classifier
projects.description: Designed a CNN-based classifier to categorize protein sequences using encoded amino acid representations.
features: Custom convolution layers for sequence data
Achieved strong performance on curated datasets

projects.name: Genome Variant Detection Pipeline
projects.description: Built a pipeline for detecting genomic variants using ML-based pattern recognition.

projects.name: Resume Chatbot
projects.description: Developed a custom RAG-powered chatbot capable of answering queries from structured resume data.

projects.name: AI-Powered Notes Summarizer
projects.description: Built an NLP-based summarization system for academic notes using pre-trained transformer models.

publications.title: CNN Approaches for Protein Sequence Classification
publications.summary: Explores deep learning approaches for protein structure prediction and sequence family classification.

responsibilities: Mentor juniors in DSA and Python

achievements: Led a team of 5 students to build novel ML applications
Managed sprint planning and code reviews
